message.content:
cs.CR, cs.CY, cs.SE, cs.CC, cs.PL 

The paper focuses on the security and privacy of a remote payment method, which falls under the category of cybersecurity (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the potential attacks that can be carried out using the sensitive private information contained in the notifications sent to customers via email and SMS, which relates to the field of cybercrime (cs.CY). The proposed improvements to overcome these problems involve software engineering and cryptography, which fall under the categories of software engineering (cs.SE), computer communication networks (cs.CC), and programming languages (cs.PL).
